title: Blended Learning-Based VR Technology Training Design: Applications in Social Sciences

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic social sector theory and practical experience, no VR technology experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment using personal devices (BYOD), requiring practice-centered social studies simulation training.

learning_goals: Learners can perform social domain practical scenarios (e.g., public policy design) with 90% accuracy through VR simulations
Learners can effectively integrate VR and traditional lecture materials in blended learning environments, improving knowledge application rates by 85%
After VR training, learners can reduce practical error rates by 40% by applying cognitive load management strategies (signaling, narration guides)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
